name: WordParty
description:
😎Grab your towel and sunblock! It's time to relax by the pool with your friends and play some a fun, addictive word game! 🥳

Word Party is a collaborative word game that you can play with as many friends as you'd like. Start a game and ask your friends to join in on the fun. Learn new vocabulary and test your spelling while working with your friends to solve a seemingly endless number of word puzzles.

How To Start The Game:

  • Enter your name and start a new room.
  • Click on the "copy share link" button and send the link to your friends (or play alone) 

How To Play The Game:

  • Using the words in the pool at the bottom of the screen, try to arrange them to make words by either:
    • Typing the words with your keyboard and hitting Enter
    • Using your mouse/touch screen to swipe/drag the letters to make words
  • Every word you guess correctly gives you points that you can use later for hints.

Features:

  • Now with nearly 500 levels!
  • This game is collaborative. You can play with as many friends as you want and combine your brain-power.
  • Use hints when you get stuck to keep you moving.
  • Improve your vocabulary and exercise your brain while having fun.
  • Go as fast or as slow as you want, there's no time limits
  • If you guess too many guesses wrong, your player emoji will start reacting.
  • Totally free to play!

Built on the GatherAct Collaboration API:

  • https://gatheract.com/create
